meanings.definition: Coming after the tenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The eleventh cupcake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: She was the eleventh person in line to buy tickets for the movie.
meanings.sent3: The eleventh cookie in the jar seemed to wink at me mischievously.
meanings.sent4: His eleventh attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The eleventh star in the sky shone the brightest that night.

meanings.sent1: He ate the eleventh slice of pizza at the party.
meanings.sent2: The eleventh of the month is his favorite because it's his birthday.
meanings.sent3: The eleventh marble in the collection was the rarest of them all.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the eleventh player on the team, always overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The eleventh row of the grid contained the hidden treasure.
